title: A robot just swapped my electric car's battery
description:
Nio is a Chinese auto maker that offers an alternative to charging: just swapping out the whole battery whenever you need it. I borrowed one of their cars. ■ Nio: https://www.nio.com/

Camera: Dion Huiskes https://feedbuilders.nl/
Editor: Julian Domanski https://www.juliandomanski.com/
